title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 01 August 2014 - XWiki

15:06 <tmortagne> is it only me or there is a lot of missing stuff in xwiki.org WYSIWYG ? I don't have any XWiki related tool (links, macros, copy/paste cleanup, etc.) when editing http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/ContributingPainPoints  
15:07 <movement> has left #xwiki  
15:09 <ClemensR1> tmortagne: testing on http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/Documentation and it looks ok there  
15:10 <tmortagne> can you try on http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/ContributingPainPoints ?  
15:10 <tmortagne> maybe it's only on that wiki  
15:10 <tmortagne> I cleaned FF cache so it's not that  
15:10 <ClemensR1> ak, ok, but on dev.xwiki.org it is missing for me, too  
15:11 <tmortagne> ok so it's something in this wiki configuration I guess  
15:12 <ClemensR1> I get a  JS error when loading the editor, but it is something from http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/jsx/XWikiOrgCode/ForkGitHub?language=en  
15:12 <ClemensR1> no such error in the other wikis  
15:12 <tmortagne> hmm maybe the issue is not on dev wiki but related to the fact it's using a skin stored on main wiki  
15:13 <tmortagne> I get the same issue on extensions.xwiki.org  
15:13 <tmortagne> sounds like subwiki using main wiki skin issue  
15:13 <ClemensR1> ah, yes, same problem on http://enterprise.xwiki.org  
15:15 <ClemensR1> same problem with the editor, I mean, not the javascript error (that one does not happen on enterprise.x.o  
15:24 <vmassol> has quit

19:37 <sdumitriu1> has joined #xwiki  
19:48 <Pbas> has quit  
19:54 <abusenius\_> has quit  
20:17 <ClemensR1> meh, I forgot how to refresh an extension on e.x.o after the xar is pushed to maven.xwiki.org  
20:24 <vmassol> ClemensR1: it's simple actually, there's an refresh button on the extension page  
20:24 <vmassol> http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/MoccaCalendar  
20:24 <vmassol> arrows going in the 2 directions one on top of the other  
20:25 <vmassol> (in green)  
20:25 <ClemensR1> vmassol: ah, ok, thanks then I just need to wait until the refresh sniffs the new version  
20:25 <vmassol> you can either force it by clicking  
20:25 <vmassol> or wait till midnight  
20:25 <ClemensR1> I guess I pressed that button a few times ... just me too impatient :)  
20:25 <vmassol> we have a scheduler task every day  
20:25 <vmassol> it's immediate normally  
20:25 <ClemensR1> ah, I guess I will wait then :)  
20:25 <vmassol> maybe you haven't promoted  
20:25 <vmassol> the release  
20:26 <vmassol> waiting won't help in this case  
20:26 <vmassol> hmm http://nexus.xwiki.org/nexus/index.html#stagingRepositories is empty  
20:26 <ClemensR1> yes, maybe something like that, I guess I will better debug that monday ... nexus looks like it is clean to me ...  
20:26 <vmassol> what version have you released?  
20:26 <ClemensR1> 2.1.9 of org.xwiki.contrib:application-mocca-calendar  
20:27 <vmassol> it's here indeed: http://maven.xwiki.org/releases/org/xwiki/contrib/application-mocca-calendar/  
20:27 <vmassol> the id looks ok on e.x.o: org.xwiki.contrib:application-mocca-calendar  
20:27 <vmassol> ah  I know  
20:27 <ClemensR1> well, I am not in such a hurry,  just wondering if I did something obviously wrong ...  
20:27 <ClemensR1> ah, listening  
20:27 <vmassol> a cahce issue  
20:27 <vmassol> \*cache  
20:27 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
20:28 <ClemensR1> ah, ok, so its not even me :)  
20:28 <vmassol> I remember thomas mentioning this  
20:28 <vmassol> let me try to celar it  
20:28 <ClemensR1> I guess I really want to  wait till the cache runs out, and check back tomorrow  
20:28 <ClemensR1> ah, or that, if it can be cleared  
20:28 <vmassol> it won't clear unless XE is restarted  
20:28 <vmassol> or someone removes files on the local machine  
20:28 <vmassol> trying  
20:29 <ClemensR1> ah, ok :( then ...  
20:29 <vmassol> I just need to remember where the aether cache is located :)  
20:30 <ClemensR1> ah, ... in some tmp or work dir of Catalina, if it its tomcat ?  
20:31 <vmassol> yes found it  
20:32 <vmassol> :)  
20:32 <vmassol> here's what I did:  
20:32 <vmassol> sudo rm -R /usr/local/tomcat/work/Catalina/localhost/xwiki/xwiki-temp/aether-repository/org/xwiki  
20:32 <vmassol> (fyi)  
20:33 <ClemensR1> ah, ok, now all xwiki is gone from the cache ...  
20:33 <vmassol> yep  
20:33 <vmassol> gtg, need to prepare dinner!  
20:34 <vmassol> has quit  
20:34 <ClemensR1> ok, thanks ... ah, too late  
20:56 <ClemensR1> has quit
